name: Flu
description: Common viral infection affecting respiratory system

name: Common Cold
description: Mild viral respiratory infection

name: COVID-19
description: Infectious disease caused by coronavirus

name: Diabetes Type 1
description: Chronic condition where pancreas produces little insulin

name: Diabetes Type 2
description: Chronic condition affecting glucose metabolism

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure condition

name: Heart Disease
description: Conditions affecting heart function

name: Asthma
description: Chronic respiratory disease causing breathing difficulty

name: Pneumonia
description: Infection that inflames air sacs in lungs

name: Tuberculosis
description: Serious infectious bacterial lung disease

name: Migraine
description: Recurring headache with severe pain

name: Anemia
description: Condition where blood lacks healthy red blood cells

name: Stroke
description: Interrupted blood supply to brain

name: Kidney Stone
description: Hard mineral deposits formed in kidneys

name: Gastritis
description: Inflammation of stomach lining

name: Hepatitis
description: Inflammation of liver often caused by virus

name: Allergy
description: Immune system reaction to foreign substances

name: Depression
description: Mental health disorder causing persistent sadness

name: Anxiety Disorder
description: Mental health disorder characterized by excessive worry

name: Cancer
description: Uncontrolled growth of abnormal cells
